Key Match Events: The Bulls defense struggled to keep the Pacers away from the rim. The Pacers were able to score 76 points in the paint, the second most the Bulls have allowed to an opponent this season.
Post-Match Reflections: The Chicago Bulls were 9-6 over their previous 15 with the 12th best defense in the NBA.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pacers scored 129 against the Bulls with a 126.5 offensive rating.
Others: The Pacers shot 28-of-44 at the rim and drew 24 fouls in the paint.
